name: Blearg
content:
Blearg was a male Gamorrean who lived in the dangerous region of the planet Tatooine known as the Outlaw's Den during the Cold War. He and the Jawa Kezzit made camp at the southeastern end of the area, and Blearg would trade loot he took from those he had killed.
Blearg appears as a Black Market vendor in the Outlaw's Den, an open-world PvP zone on Tatooine in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
